One source familiar with the effort to recruit Mike Pence tells National Review Online that while Mike Pence "could have united the conservative movement," his departure leaves a Republican field that is never going to be as wide-open again.----------------------------------------

Things seem to be turning around for Michael Vick off the field as well. He just signed his first paid endorsement contract since his release from prison. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval.
